backend/main.mo: Defines core types, storage maps, and authorization/invite mixins for the booking canister, including hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the build-version update requirement to the file frontend/src/buildInfo.ts with metadata for components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including routing, hooks, UI components, and build info.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with shared base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry document setting metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Regression checklist covering authentication, role behavior, rooms, bookings, and other critical flows for frontend releases.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry configuring TanStack Router, React Query, localization provider, and protected routes.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version constant set to 'v27'.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin UI component displaying all bookings in a table with loading state, status badges, totals, and booking detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Admin panel listing hotels with controls to toggle active status and update subscription state.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: UI for generating, validating, and listing invite tokens bound to hotel principals.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays access‑denied messaging with role requirements and optional hotel activation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Error screen for permission‑guard failures with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form to validate and consume invite tokens to activate a hotel account.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Blocks access until an authenticated user completes a minimal profile form.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper enforcing Internet Identity login before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and hotel activation before rendering children or showing access or error screens.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Displays booking details in a dialog with status, dates, pricing, optional guest principal, and payment proof info.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Provides a form for users to create a room booking, validating dates and guests before submitting.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge showing a booking's status with a variant and label based on the status value.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Shows a modal dialog containing an image preview with a close button and optional title.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays authentication diagnostics including principal ID, role, admin status, and hotel activation state.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Shows a table of hotel bookings with details, statuses, and access to the booking details dialog.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages hotel payment methods, allowing adding and removing methods and showing current entries.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form panel for viewing and updating hotel profile details including name, location, address, map link, WhatsApp, and email with validation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Displays eligible bookings and allows hotel staff to mark stays as completed.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photos with fallback handling and supports both full and compact gallery layouts.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages hotel rooms with create/edit dialogs, image uploads, and a table listing existing rooms.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows hotel subscription and activation status with contextual alerts and payment guidance.
Application layout wrapper providing navigation, main content area, and footer with build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Simple locale selector allowing switching between supported languages (currently English only).
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing links based on authentication, role, and hotel profile, with login/logout and language selection.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Card showing admin contact and payment options for hotel activation and subscription scenarios.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and provides WhatsApp/email contact buttons for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, admin status, and invite tokens via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles reading image files as data URLs with simulated progress tracking for uploads.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a simple locale context storing and retrieving the current language from localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styling to body and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user authentication status, roles, hotel profile info, and supports invite token validation, consumption, and admin elevation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard with panels for managing invite tokens, hotel visibility, and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of hotels with image previews and navigation to hotel detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows a guest’s account overview and booking history with actions to browse hotels or view booking details.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Loads the current user's hotel profile and presents management tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details for a selected hotel, including address, photos, rooms, payment methods, and booking form.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: React page rendering the main menu with guest and hotel portal actions, using user role and hotel activation data to decide navigation.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: TypeScript definitions mirroring backend Motoko types, including hotel, room, booking, profile, and API interface structures.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility enabling debug mode based on environment or a debug URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Money formatting helpers with currency symbols, names, supported codes, and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs, including failed image handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s goal to fully restore backend and frontend to Version 27, including feature and migration requirements.
